name: Ashley McDaniel
text: Absolutely amazing pizza!! We are visiting and the kiddos wanted pizza really bad.... We saw how great the reviews were so figured we give them a try... Qe loved it and have actually ordered twice since we have been here. So if your looking ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Joyce
text: Fresh pizza always.  The two dollars extra for stuffed crust is worth it.  This is an option only when you order a large topping.  I would recommend eating pizza from here because their ingridients are fresh and boy are they good on loading your pizza.  You wont be disappointed.

name: Stephanie Arslanian
text: We use to order Hungry Howies 4x a month.  We actually got tired of their mistakes,  forgetting half our order and then expecting us to wait another hour to hour and a half before we could get the rest of our order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Grumpy42
text: Pizza was very poor quality.  I have had much better Pizza from a gas station.  Will not return.

name: Alex Warren
text: Love it. Always good food. Ordering on the mobile app is so easy and the service is always nice. They did forget my second sauce dip the other week, but I'll forgive them since that's the first mistake they've ever made in two years. Also, so easy to earn free pizza with an online account.

name: Rockstar Kate
text: Loved the crust. I got the Howie's Hawaiian pizza with the cheesy butter crust. And the stuffed Howie bread. That was delicious!

name: Kobie Chivers
text: Food took almost 2 hours to arrive. When I called to check on the status of the food I was informed that they were not able to find my adress on Google maps and then they proceeded to reread my adress and state exactly where I lived and ‚Ä¶More

name: Curtis Wood
text: Pizza was good. Love the flavored crust. Orders are made fast and if they are busy they let you know. I ordered on the app and have several times and its fast and convenient.  Oh and the wings and breadsticks are great too!

name: ruston stevens
text: There was a piece of hard white plastic in my pizza, l makes me wonder if there was more that I missed....

text: Awesome pizza and super speedy delivery to Southern Utah Rv Resort

text: This was my first time ordering from HH pizza and it was perfect the tasted is so much better then Domino pizza I will be buying from HH pizza in the future üëç

text: The whole team was funny and very helpful! We ordered a large, then they found out they were out of large sized dough or something, so they gave us two mediums instead! Great place and great pizza!

text: Ordered 10 minutes before close, understandably they cant deliver, my fault for ordering that late, but 3-4 days before I can see my money back? Most places can refund within a day.

name: Steve Fosnight
text: Great pizza!

name: Celeste Anaya
text: Awesome food and costumer service. I'm from Seattle Washington and I think this place would be great back in Washington. Honestly the best pizza I've tasted in a long time.

text: I'm not gonna lie, when my boys first wanted to go here, I was a little hesitant. Can't we just go to Pizza Hut or something? "No mom, we had it at school. This is better, I promise!" WOW!! Were they right or what?! I highly recommend the Works on Asiago Cheese crust! We will definitely be back.

text: This Howie's location is where we always go for pizza. They are constantly running specials and we pretty much spend money here every time they do. Great service. Delicious pizza!

text: Rotten salads, like actually rotted. Pizza when fully cooked is yummy but it's usually way undercooked and doughy. More than once the pizza was made wrong and absolutely no compensation or customer service. Wouldn't recommend this location.

text: The service is fast, the personnel friendly and amazing deals.

name: Natasha Asmus
text: Really enjoyed the pizza! Tried a meat lovers with classic buttered crust and stuffed with cheese. Our order was ready right on time and I am looking forward to trying some of the other flavors.

name: Coley L.
text: Very inconsistent service overall. The pizza is either really good with a decent amount of toppings, or soggy, or well-cooked but it looks like they ran out of toppings and gave us what was left over. The delivery service is also shaky. ‚Ä¶More

text:
If you like Pizza this is a good place. They always have 5$ 10$ 15$ 20$ deals and so on.
Very friendly staff. You can order for pick up or delivery.
